# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.0, 4.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 0.0, 5.5), boiler(position 0.0, 3.5) and offshore pump (position 0.0, 1.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(3.0, -73.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 3.0, -73.0)
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, -71.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest (position -14.5, -48.5)

### Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of all the required ingredients before attempting to craft an item. Check the recipe for the item to see what is needed.
- In particular, the agent repeatedly attempts to craft burner mining drills and iron gear wheels, but does not have enough iron plates to do so. Increase iron plate production.

# NAMESPACE

### Functions
None

### Variables
None
